msg: GERONIMO-4992  undo mistaken removal of tomcat osgi-unfriendliness workaround

author: buscob
msg: Added a "create" class to the buttontext for buttons that represents "Create New" operations.
This allows themes to style these buttons with additional "+" icons or whatever.
The idea is to add a "functional" class wherever needed so that the button-bar can be styled better by the theme.

author: buscob
msg: Added a specific class for the "Displaying..." text in the renderNextPrev macro.
